nodes.text: Thavish was a male officer of the Fleet Intelligence of the New Republic during the Galactic Civil War.
Born around 34 BBY, during the final years of the Galactic Republic, Thavish grew up where he served in the New Republic during the war against the Galactic Empire.

Around 5.5 ABY, he served in the rank of commander as the intelligence coordinator of the Rapid Response Task Force commanded by Admiral Kalback. Before the Battle of Mindor, he gave a briefing to the captains of the task force, where he was ordered by Luke Skywalker to be concise and not to use euphemisms when talking about people that suffer.
